description: a(n) = n-th sept-factorial number divided by 2.
links: Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
mathematica: s=1;lst={s};Do[s+=n*s;AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 8, 5!, 7}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 08 2008 *)
prog: (PARI) vector(20, n, prod(j=1, n, 7*j-5)/2) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 07 2015
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
